incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in ways that were hurtful, vulgar, or unbecoming of my dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with words that lacked self - control
incontinence.question: Did I speak to others with words that lacked self-control, using language that was unbecoming or hurtful?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, possibly leading to excess weight gain or diminished physical health?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable through my deeds
beyond what 's reasonable through my deeds
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable through my deeds, demonstrating an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejecting the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating , drinking , or other pleasures
to the point where they negatively impacted your relationship with yourself
gluttony.question: Did you indulge excessively in eating, drinking, or other pleasures to the point where they negatively impacted your relationship with yourself?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I engaged in excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my family's financial needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively and wastefully used my financial resources to prioritize indulgences over my responsibilities towards my family and loved ones?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked financial resources entrusted to me, prioritizing recreational activities over my family's needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing my acquaintances ' private lives
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing my acquaintances' private lives, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing information about acquaintances ' private lives
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing information about acquaintances' private lives, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you use Sunday for personal gain when it could have been avoided, thus diminishing its sacred character?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: due to misunderstandings or differences in opinion
anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage rather than seeking reconciliation in my relationships, especially when conflicts arise due to misunderstandings or differences in opinion?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
